description: This file defines a singleton object NetworkModule which configures and provides network-related dependencies such as Moshi, OkHttpClient, and Retrofit for the app. It sets up JSON parsing, logging, and HTTP headers, and provides a publicly accessible ApiService instance.

classes.name: NetworkModule
classes.description: A singleton object providing configured network dependencies like Retrofit, OkHttp, and Moshi.

methods.name: moshi
methods.description: Lazy-initialized Moshi instance with KotlinJsonAdapterFactory for JSON parsing.

methods.name: logging
methods.description: Lazy-initialized HttpLoggingInterceptor with BASIC level logging.

methods.name: headersInterceptor
methods.description: Interceptor adding 'Accept: application/json' header to outgoing requests.

methods.name: okHttp
methods.description: Lazy-initialized OkHttpClient configured with headersInterceptor, logging, and timeouts.

methods.name: retrofit
methods.description: Lazy-initialized Retrofit instance with base URL, OkHttpClient, and Moshi converter.
